poem:
The Weight of Time

Adrien takes the stage,
a man once measured by moments 
counted in a cage, 
the tick-tock of lost years echoing
in 251 seats,
where silence, guilt, and exoneration meet.
The story unfolds, 
a life not lived but surviving,
a heartbeat finally heard,
like the pages of a book 
just now being read aloud.
